enWisdom: Forgive and you will be supported
Pardon and you will be pardoned

Wisdom: إِذَا سَمِعْتَ مِنَ الْمَكْرُوهِ مَا يُؤْذِيكَ فَتَطَأْطَأْ لَهُ يُخْطِكَ
enWisdom: When you hear something hateful that troubles you, then lower your head, taking no notice of it, and it will pass you by
Through forgiveness [of others] divine mercy is invoked

Wisdom: تَجَاوَزْ عَنِ الزَّلَلِ وَأَقِلِ الْعَثَرَاتِ تُرْفَعْ لَكَ الدَّرَجَاتُ
enWisdom: Overlook missteps and pardon mistakes, [for by this] your station will be elevated
He who seeks forgiveness (or is indigent) is not reprimanded

Wisdom: لَا تَنْدَمَنَّ عَلَى عَفْوٍ وَلَا تَبْهَجَنَّ بِعُقُوبَةٍ
enWisdom: Never feel regret for forgiving and never be gladdened by punishing

Wisdom: لَا تُعَاجِلِ الذَّنْبَ بِالْعُقُوبَةِ وَاتْرُكْ بَيْنَهُمَا لِلْعَفْوِ مَوْضِعاً تُحْرِزْ بِهِ الْأَجْرَ وَالْمَثُوبَةَ
enWisdom: Do not hasten the punishment for a sin and leave room between the two (iethe sin and punishment) for forgiveness, through this you will gain recompense and reward
